Since I was elected to represent OH-14, I've returned over $1 million to the Treasury. Fiscal responsibility is needed to create a stronger, more prosperous USA for the next generation, which is why I began returning unused taxpayer funds back when I was Geauga County Prosecutor.

Considering that the U.S. is rapidly approaching $29 trillion in debt, each year I request that any unused funds from my office be transferred to the Treasury to help reduce the deficit. Below is my letter to the Chief Administrative Officer with this year's request. https://t.co/pSVTqy42xl
